pages.title: first try
pages.text: C1ick3r’s BlogThis is a test page and the first trial for a C1ick3r’s Blog via Gitbook IO.These hooks for node.js are used for only test uses, not for commercial use. 该页面为测试页面，且为通过Gitbook IO来建立C1ick3r的博客的首测。本页面所基于node.js所使用的HOOK仅用于测试，并非商业用途。
